Two Russian nationals were passengers on jet which went missing over Afghanistan - TASSTwo Russian citizens were passengers on a charter flight bound for Moscow that disappeared over Afghanistan, Russia's state-run TASS news agency said on Sunday, citing a source "in the operational services". Sun, 21 Jan 2024 09:50:58 GMT P4XUBOLCCBOPRI3JUHWAUT4TJI https://www.reuters.com/world/two- Russian-nationals-were-passengers-jet-which-went-missing-over-afghanistan-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Russia takes control of village in Kharkiv region - defence ministryRussian forces have taken control of the village of Krokhmalne in Ukraine's Kharkiv region, Russia's Defence Ministry said on Sunday. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 09:09:48 GMT C65GSB7DVBLE3I5ZHI325GLH2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-takes-control-village-kharkiv-region-defence-ministry-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Fire erupts at Russia's Novatek Baltic Sea terminal after explosions heardA fire broke out at a Baltic Sea terminal belonging to Novatek , Russia's largest liquefied natural gas producer, regional officials said on Sunday, amid reports of explosions and Ukrainian drone sightings in the area. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:47:30 GMT 3DSJU442XZPM3I2D7JEJ6FUBHU https://www.reuters.com/world/fire-erupts-Russias-novatek-baltic-sea-terminal-after-explosions-heard-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Thirteen killed after Ukraine shells Russian-controlled city of Donetsk - officialsThirteen people were killed and 10 more injured after Ukrainian forces shelled the Russian-controlled city of Donetsk in eastern Ukraine, Denis Pushilin, the Russian-appointed head of the Donetsk region, said on Sunday. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:28:50 GMT F2SAU3F2MBPODI5FXNGGWE6QKE https://www.reuters.com/world/eight-killed-after-ukraine-shells-Russian-control-city-donetsk-mayor-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Two die, four injured in Johannesburg building fireTwo people were killed and four were injured when fire engulfed a residential building in Johannesburg early on Sunday, city officials said, adding search and rescue operations were still underway. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:12:37 GMT FJZCR5O37FPFBI72PK7IKRSPWU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/two-die-four-injured-johannesburg-building-fire-2024-01-21/Reuters世界非洲
Fire at Novatek's terminal caused by explosions - Russia's RIA agencyA fire at a terminal of Russia's largest liquefied natural gas producer Novatek on the Baltic Sea was caused by two explosions, the state RIA news agency reported on Sunday, citing local officials. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:04:04 GMT TFGDKY3ECJK33IVIZVBSSTFNSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/fire-novateks-terminal-caused-by-explosions-Russias-ria-agency-2024-01-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian charter flight with 6 people disappears over Afghanistan; crash reportedRussian aviation authorities said in a statement the plane was a charter ambulance flight traveling from India, via Uzbekistan to Moscow on a French-made Dassault Aviation Falcon 10 jet. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 07:16:46 GMT DYJUR45N55PUXBWMWGYX3ZL3RQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/report-plane-crash-northern-afghanistans-badakhshan-province-police-2024-01-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ethiopians celebrate "Timket" festival that marks Jesus' baptismThousands of Ethiopian Orthodox followers gathered in the capital Addis Ababa on Friday and Saturday to celebrate Epiphany, also called Timket, a religious festival commemorating Jesus' baptism in the Jordan River. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 06:07:13 GMT OELTPBQBONJM5NZE4UCHCSBZMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethiopians-celebrate-timket-festival-that-marks-jesus-baptism-2024-01-21/Dawit Endeshaw世界非洲
NATO's Steadfast Defender exercises mark return to Cold War schemes, Russia saysNATO said it was launching its largest exercise since the Cold War involving some 90,000 troops. Two Russian sailors held in Mozambique as financial hostages, Moscow saysTwo Russian sailors being held in the Mozambique port of Maputo are financial hostages in a dispute between the ship's owner and its local customer, Russia's foreign ministry told the state RIA news agency in remarks published on Sunday. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 04:02:41 GMT UKPQ2HZK4NJRLFKXYWWU57OAKI https://www.reuters.com/world/two- Russian-sailors-held-mozambique-financial-hostages-moscow-says-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Religious spectacle to mark opening of Ram temple by India's ModiA grand temple to Hindu god Lord Ram opens on Monday on a site in India millions believe is his birthplace, in a religious spectacle led by Prime Minister Narendra Modi months before he seeks a rare third term in elections. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 02:33:38 GMT QN4W6UJMPRMHFEGG5JKTVO3LDM https://www.reuters.com/world/india/religious-spectacle-mark-opening-ram-temple-by-indias-modi-2024-01-21/Saurabh Sharma, Rajesh Prabhuswamy世界印度
